mapper.select: SELECT q.question_id, q.category_id, c.category_name, q.question_text, q.explanation, q.points, q.difficulty, q.created_by, q.created_at, o.option_id, o.option_text, o.is_correct FROM exam_questions eq INNER JOIN questions q ON eq.question_id = q.question_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON q.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN options o ON q.question_id = o.question_id WHERE eq.exam_id = #{examId} ORDER BY eq.question_order, o.option_id
SELECT e.*, c.category_name FROM exams e LEFT JOIN categories c ON e.category_id = c.category_id WHERE e.exam_id = #{examId}

SELECT e.*, c.category_name FROM exams e LEFT JOIN categories c ON e.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY e.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT e.*, c.category_name FROM exams e LEFT JOIN categories c ON e.category_id = c.category_id WHERE e.is_active = true ORDER BY CASE WHEN e.exam_date IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, e.exam_date DESC, e.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exams (exam_title, category_id, description, total_questions, total_points, duration_minutes, passing_score, is_published, is_active, exam_date, created_by) VALUES (#{examTitle}, #{categoryId}, #{description}, #{totalQuestions}, #{totalPoints}, #{durationMinutes}, #{passingScore}, #{isPublished}, #{isActive}, #{examDate}, #{createdBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE exams SET exam_title = #{examTitle}, description = #{description}, total_points = #{totalPoints}, duration_minutes = #{durationMinutes}, passing_score = #{passingScore}, is_published = #{isPublished}, is_active = #{isActive}, exam_date = #{examDate} WHERE exam_id = #{examId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_questions (exam_id, question_id, question_order) VALUES (#{examId}, #{questionId}, #{questionOrder})
mapper.select: SELECT question_id FROM exam_questions WHERE exam_id = #{examId} ORDER BY question_order
